availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, confectioner. Native of Italy. Married to Mary Zanone. Father of Laura Zanone and Anna Zanone. Confectioner in Jefferson County in 1850. Confectioner in Jefferson County in 1860. Employed Cathe Moore as a domestic in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 3, p. 269A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Ward 4, p. 38.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Ward 5, p. 522A-522B.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007126, Jefferson County Deaths, p.208.
